DataChecksum.Ignore: DisplayName, ShortName, Capitol, Description, UnitSkinColor, UnitHairColor, UnitClothColor, BuildingPrimaryColor, BuildingSecondaryColor, BuildingRoofColor, BuildingStyle, UnitStyle, WorkerName

FlavorText.Text: Your cities look fat and full of coin, your people look weak and cowardly - I declare war upon [L_FactionShortName]!
People of [L_FactionName] - this land belongs to the Hashaini and we do not abide trespassers. Withdraw now or we will take your lives.
Fortune smiles on us it seems, [L_LeaderName]. We look forward to getting closer to you in the future.

...and we thought we were the most desperate and ragtag group of humans around. I guess we are glad to met you then [L_FactionShortName]. We have no love for the Kingdoms of men who have shunned us, but now that we are strong perhaps we can come to an understanding.
[L_LeaderName] of Capitar. We of the Hashaini send our greetings. Like you we enjoy earning Gildar, perhaps we can can work something out.
[L_LeaderName], sovereign ruler of Gilden. We of the Hashaini send our greetings. We look forward to profiting from having such industrious neighbours.
Most noble [L_LeaderName], sovereign of Pariden. We of the Hashaini send our greetings. Now that we are strong perhaps you will lower yourselves and speak with us, hmmm?
[L_LeaderName] of Tarth; word of your free kingdom, and your fighting prowess, has spread to the wild peoples of the Hashaini. We are very similiar don't you think?.
Hail, [L_LeaderName]. We of Hashaini send greetings to you and your people. Just so you know we make horrible slaves. We tend to bite .
[L_LeaderName] of Resoln; word has reached the free peoples of the Hashaini of your Empire's great power. Perhaps you see a mutually beneficial relationship our peoples' future?.
Hail, [L_LeaderName] of Umber. Long have we looked up to your strength and daring. We will be seeing you around.
[L_LeaderName] of Yithril; word has reached even us of your Empire's rise and unmatched strength. We will be seeing you around.
Well look what we have here, it seems another faction wanders these shattered wastes. We will be seeing you around.
The Hashaini are always looking for a good deal. Perhaps we can seperate you from your Gilder, eh?
Your actions prove you enemy to Hundura, [L_LeaderName]. You will know our wrath, I declare war upon you and your peoples.
People of [L_FactionName] - on behalf of our great people, I welcome you, but not your soldiers and arms, into our great lands.
Greetings, [L_LeaderName]. The people of [L_FactionName] are known to us. We welcome your business.

Noble [L_LeaderName]. Sovereign of the great Kingdom of Altar. Hail, and well met from the peoples of Hundura. It is my hope our countries will enjoy a long and friendly relationship. We have many things including enemies in common.
To our brethren of the kingdom of Gilden: to their sovereign leader, [L_LeaderName]. I bring greetings from the people of Hundura and the horse lords of our great people.
To the most magnificent, most noble [L_LeaderName] of Pariden; we of Hundura wish to offer our greetings and our hope that our two nations will become the best of friends.
[L_LeaderName], sovereign ruler of Tarth. We the Hundura admire your strength and spirit. I hope we can work together.
[L_LeaderName] of Kraxis, let it be what we have in common that defines our relationship instead of our differences. As long as your intentions are peaceful that is.
Greetings [L_LeaderName] and greetings to the people of Magnar. We of Hundura admire your strength, however we do not fear it either. If you send warriors they will be met in kind.
[L_LeaderName], greatest of Oracles. I bring greetings from the horse lords of Hundura. We hope for peace between our nations.

Greetings to [L_LeaderName]; sovereign of the peoples of Umber. [S_LeaderName], our sovereign, stands ready to deal with you in friendship, as he firmly believes it is the spirit that matters not the body.
Mighty [L_LeaderName] of Yithril. Your nation's rise is swift, and unforeseen. We admire your strength and power. We can meet you in friendship or in battle.
Welcome to Hundura. Here the people of the horse dwell. We hope to get to know you better.
People of [L_FactionName] - if you have goods to trade, then let us see them, that we may negotiate a fair and equitable price!
